00100 /* flushes based on the current select mode.  if in vertex select mode,
00101  * verts select/deselect edges and faces, if in edge select mode,
00102  * edges select/deselect faces and vertices, and in face select mode faces select/deselect
00103  * edges and vertices.*/
00104 void EDBM_select_more(struct BMEditMesh *em);
00105 void EDBM_select_less(struct BMEditMesh *em);
